languages.text: Вольный Торговец не пожелал{mf||а}, чтобы на Кьяве Гамма уцелело хотя бы одно отравленное зерно ереси. Работа мануфакторумов остановлена на время великого очищения.
The Rogue Trader wished that not a single poisoned seed of heresy on Kiava Gamma be allowed to survive. The work of the manufactorums has been halted for the duration of the great cleansing.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец не пожелал{mf||а}, чтобы на Кьяве Гамма уцелело хотя бы одно отравленное зерно ереси. Работа мануфакторумов остановлена на время великого очищения.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader wished that not a single poisoned seed of heresy on Kiava Gamma be allowed to survive. The work of the manufactorums has been halted for the duration of the great cleansing.

The Rogue Trader wished that not a single poisoned seed of heresy on Kiava Gamma be allowed to survive. The work of the manufactorums has been halted for the duration of the great cleansing.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha decidido erradicar hasta la última semilla de herejía en Kiava Gamma. La labor de los manufactorums se verá interrumpida mientras dure la gran purga.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader wished that not a single poisoned seed of heresy on Kiava Gamma be allowed to survive. The work of the manufactorums has been halted for the duration of the great cleansing.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha decidido erradicar hasta la última semilla de herejía en Kiava Gamma. La labor de los manufactorums se verá interrumpida mientras dure la gran purga.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} veut éradiquer jusqu'à la dernière graine empoisonnée de l'hérésie sur le sol de Kiava Gamma. La production des manufactorums a été suspendue pendant toute la durée de la grande entreprise de purification.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader wished that not a single poisoned seed of heresy on Kiava Gamma be allowed to survive. The work of the manufactorums has been halted for the duration of the great cleansing.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} veut éradiquer jusqu'à la dernière graine empoisonnée de l'hérésie sur le sol de Kiava Gamma. La production des manufactorums a été suspendue pendant toute la durée de la grande entreprise de purification.

languages.text: 行商浪人下令将基亚瓦伽马星的异端斩草除根。在大清洗期间，制造工厂也停止了生产。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader wished that not a single poisoned seed of heresy on Kiava Gamma be allowed to survive. The work of the manufactorums has been halted for the duration of the great cleansing.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人下令将基亚瓦伽马星的异端斩草除根。在大清洗期间，制造工厂也停止了生产。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーはキアヴァ・ガンマの異端に毒された種を一粒たりとも生き残らせないことを望んだ。大浄化の間、聖工場の作業は停止された。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader wished that not a single poisoned seed of heresy on Kiava Gamma be allowed to survive. The work of the manufactorums has been halted for the duration of the great cleansing.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーはキアヴァ・ガンマの異端に毒された種を一粒たりとも生き残らせないことを望んだ。大浄化の間、聖工場の作業は停止された。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat den Wunsch geäußert, dass kein einziger vergifteter Keim der Ketzerei auf Kiava Gamma überlebt. Die Arbeit der Manufactorien wurde für die Dauer der großen Säuberung eingestellt.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader wished that not a single poisoned seed of heresy on Kiava Gamma be allowed to survive. The work of the manufactorums has been halted for the duration of the great cleansing.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat den Wunsch geäußert, dass kein einziger vergifteter Keim der Ketzerei auf Kiava Gamma überlebt. Die Arbeit der Manufactorien wurde für die Dauer der großen Säuberung eingestellt.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in, Kiava Gama'da zehir saçan tek bir kâfirlik tohumunun bile sağ kalmasına göz yummaya niyeti yoktu. Manufaktorumların çalışması, bu büyük temizlik sürecinde durduruldu.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader wished that not a single poisoned seed of heresy on Kiava Gamma be allowed to survive. The work of the manufactorums has been halted for the duration of the great cleansing.
